name: BUV Gamejam May 2022
description:
WARNING: THERE IS A BUG THAT NOT PLAY AUDIO WHEN PLAY THE GAME 1ST TIME, JUST CONTINUE PLAY THE GAME THEN GO BACK TO MAIN MENU. IT WILL FIX ITSELF. The Last Star Lord is a 2D Platformer that follows the theme "Star" from BUV. 

In this game, player uses their star power to manipulate enemy and make shadow enemy vulnerable.

Features:

  • Double jump
  • Perform a melee attack 
  • Shoot a yellow star that pushes or pulls an enemy
  • Shoot a blue star that makes shadow enemy vulnerable
  • A powerful boss awaits at the end of the game

Key Controls:

  • A and D -> Move left and right
  • Space bar -> Jump <Press twice to double jump>
  • Left click -> Melee attack
  • Key 1 + right click -> Shoot a yellow star -> A / D -> push or pull an enemy
  • Key 2 + right click -> Shoot a blue star

Controller Type: 

KEYBOARD + MOUSE ONLY, no support for gamepad :(

Credits:

  • hoanglongplanner -> Audio Manager 
  • Zrider -> Programmer
  • Ocill -> Level Designer
  • Hao -> UI Designer
